refnamediv.refpurpose: converts a graph to a simple undirected graph

listitem.para: graph data structure of the new graph

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: graph_simp returns the simple undirected graph g1 corresponding to multigraph g. It deletes loops in g, replaces directed edges with undirected edges and replaces multiple edges with single edges.A simple graph is also called a strict graph.
